冸字的基本解释

冸
pàn
古同“泮”。

冸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pàn］
［《廣韻》普半切，去换，滂。］
“泮1”的古字。
冰溶化。后多作“泮”。

冸字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【冫字部】　冸； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页132第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?普半切，音判。冰釋也。通作泮。【詩·邶風】士如歸妻，迨冰未泮。　又【韻補】叶匹見切，音片。【蘇軾·燕山詩】攻堅甚攻玉，乗瑕易冰冸。中原但常治，敵勢要生變。

冸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
冸字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［pàn］
["Guangyun" is cut in half, go for it, punky. ]
The ancient character of "Pan 1".
The ice melts. Later, "Pan" is often used.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [冫字部] 　冸; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 132 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Half cut in general, phonetic judgment. Bing also. Pass for pan. [Poetry·Bei Feng] A scholar is like a homecoming wife.　[Rhyme Supplement] Yepi sees cut, sound film. [Su Shi·Yanshan Poems] Tackling toughness is very good at jade, and it is easy to take advantage of flaws. The Central Plains is always governed, and the enemy's power is about to change.
